titles.title: AL312 - Nader, My God, By U
Nearer, my God, to Thee

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Nader, my God, by U,
steeds naderby!
Hoe swaar die kruis ook al,
bestem vir my -
tog sal my lied steeds bly:
nader, my God, by U;
Nader, my God, by U,
steeds naderby!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Al rus ek, swerweling,
eensaam, alleen,
met hierdie moeë hoof
slegs op 'n steen;
Tog voer my drome my
nader, my God, by U;
Nader, my God, by U,
steeds naderby!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Daar sien ek in die lig
‘n hemelleer;
En duisend engele,
klim op en neer.
Hul roep en wink vir my
nader, my God, by U;
Nader, my God, by U,
steeds naderby!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Dan as ek weer ontwaak,
daar in Gods hof,
bou ek 'n altaar tot
Sy eer en lof.
So lei beproewing my
nader, my God, by U;
Nader, my God, by U,
steeds naderby!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
En as ek juigend styg
deur gindse sfeer -
son, maan en ster verby -
loof ek my Heer.
Dan bring my loflied my
nader, my God, by U;
Nader, my God, by U,
steeds naderby.
